list_definition.definition: (often with for) to look for something by careful examination

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Have you searched through your pockets thoroughly?
I’ve been searching for that book for weeks.

list_definition.definition: (of the police etc) to examine, looking for eg stolen goods

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was taken to the police station, searched and questioned.
His search did not take long.
